软件包 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.allocation.group

类摘要
AutoBalance Class user for auto balance all tables in hbase start with hbase
MoveConfImpl This class is used for update regionserver configuration and library It use two shell script in ${hbase_home}/hbase-webapps/master/ , moveremoteconf.sh and restartserver.sh , make sure you have permission
MoveGroupPlan Used for change regionserver groups Include move regions between regionservers and update configuration fold and library fold
ProcessMove This class is used for change regionserver group property It will move all regions off a regionserver ,and then move into other regionserver left on this group.
ServerWithGroup Read group configuration from hdfs and write back to hdfs Also provide region and table information on regionserver
